titleStmt.title: Samuel Coulter v. William Billings. Writ

distributor.name: Center for Digital Research in the Humanities

bibl.title: Samuel Coulter v. William Billings. Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Terry. of Wash. County of Pierce } ss
In District Court of 3rd Jud. Dist. of W.T., holding terms at Steilacoom
H. Sherff vs. F.A. Sprochule, Wolf Schafer, M. Steeth, Partnered in business under the firm name of Sprochule Co

And now on motion of Ballard and Nyche, Attys for Plaintiff and upon show- ing made to the Court that an application had been made to Samuel Coulter, Collector of Internal Revenue for the Territory of Wash- ington for Certified Copies of official papers in said Collector's office deemed by Plaintiff's Attys material and pertained to the matters in issue and it further appear- ing to the Court that said Certified Copies were by Samuel Coulter, Collector, refused to plaintiff herein under the misapprehension of said Col- lector that it was not his official duty to furnish such certified copies, it is now there- fore here by the Court Ordered.

That Samuel Coulter, the Collector of Internal Revenue for the Territory of Wash- ington do furnish to Plaintiff or his Attys upon application Certified Copies of any official papers in his said Collector's office deemed by said Plaintiff's Attys pertained to the matters in issue in the suit herein.
January 22, 1872 (Signed) O. Jacobs, Judge 3rd Jud. Dist. W.T.
I hereby certify that the above is a true and correct copy of the original order of the court placed in my hands force service
D.W. C. Davisson Sheriff Pierce Co W.T. by W.C. Hawks Deputy
